meanings.definition: Moving or spinning in a circular motion.
meanings.sent1: The twirly ballerina danced gracefully on stage.
meanings.sent2: Her twirly skirt fluttered in the breeze as she spun around.
meanings.sent3: The twirly toy top kept spinning even after she stopped it.
meanings.sent4: The twirly windmill blades spun rapidly in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The twirly carousel ride made the children giggle with delight.

meanings.sent1: The seashell had a beautiful twirly pattern on its surface.
meanings.sent2: She drew a twirly line that spiraled down the page.
meanings.sent3: The twirly straw in her drink made her smile.
meanings.sent4: The twirly staircase in the old castle was enchanting.
meanings.sent5: The twirly tail of the piglet was adorable to watch.

meanings.sent1: She loves to twirly in circles until she gets dizzy.
meanings.sent2: The colorful pinwheel twirly in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: He tried to twirly the hula hoop around his waist.
meanings.sent4: The helicopter blades twirly as it took off into the sky.
meanings.sent5: The figure skater can twirly on the ice with grace and skill.
